LanguageData.Bullet_CaniculaRifle.label: charge shot
LanguageData.Polarisbloc_CaniculaRifle.label: canicula - II universal rifle
LanguageData.Polarisbloc_CaniculaRifle.description: The universal rifle, produced by Polarisbloc has a specially treated energy release device that can fire bullets that are extremely threatening to live bodies.
